summary: Provides the central EC2 service backend for the Moto library, aggregating individual resource backends (instances, volumes, networking, security, etc.) and exposing unified operations to simulate the AWS EC2 API. Includes a settings manager for the default EBS encryption state and a helper utility for validating EC2 resource identifiers.
business_intent: Enable developers to run automated tests and develop locally against a fully mocked EC2 environment that mimics AWS behavior without incurring real cloud costs.
